description: Not even the coronavirus emergency will stop the French voting in local elections.
title: France's Macron defies coronavirus lockdown with elections
title_page: France's Macron defies coronavirus lockdown with elections - BBC News
maintext: The French government has issued guidelines to polling stations across the country, asking that people are kept at least a metre away from each other at all times. The interior minister even asked voters to bring their own pens, to avoid transmitting the virus that way.
